**Example 1: 请求示例**



Input: 

```
tccli eiam UpdateOrgNode --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DisplayName 字符串 \
    --OrgNodeId 7999987a-c9dc-4dd2-b3e2-b52f53317aa6 \
    --Description 更新组织机构 \
    --CustomizedOrgNodeId BB1
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "4b6a3cd0-24cb-4ab2-8ecf-448b52f76784"
    }
}
```
